short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: hide/view HTML elements on a web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this extension to unhide hidden elements on a webpage, it provides:
- Easy to use UI
- Reveal the hidden fields.
- Hide elements.
- Clear/Revert the webpage to it's original look.
- Option to add shortcut keys to reveal all fields.
